subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Danica Patrick, who last week became the first woman to win an IndyCar race, was never in contention in the RoadRunner Turbo Indy 300 in Kansas City, Kan., and was knocked out with a broken wheel hub after 156 laps. Patrick started third, but finished 19th. Dan Wheldon held off Tony Kanaan to win his second consecutive I.R.L. IndyCar Series race at Kansas Speedway.
